bibl.title: Part of Tomos Sygkollesimos of Hypomnemata (P. Cairo SR 3049, 36-39).
bibl.note: Presentation and edition of the second of seven "hypomnemata" pasted together to form a tomos sygkollesimos. Lease for a parcel of cleruchic land for three years. Arsinoite, 144 A.D. The back of the roll contains seven columns of a list of taxes on land. Theadelphia, c. after 155 A.D.

bibl.title: Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology

bibl.seg: Omar Sayed, Part of Tomos Sygkollesimos of Hypomnemata (P. Cairo SR 3049, 36-39).
Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology (Chico, 1981) pp. 231-238.

Presentation and edition of the second of seven "hypomnemata" pasted together to form a tomos sygkollesimos. Lease for a parcel of cleruchic land for three years. Arsinoite, 144 A.D. The back of the roll contains seven columns of a list of taxes on land. Theadelphia, c. after 155 A.D.
